definition: dark brown mustelid of woodlands of Eurasia that gives off an unpleasant odor when threatened
details:
noun
- dark brown mustelid of woodlands of Eurasia that gives off an unpleasant odor when threatened
= synonyms: fitch, foulmart, foumart
- American musteline mammal typically ejecting an intensely malodorous fluid when startled
= synonyms: wood pussy
